dc_description_s: Connections 2045 Plan for Greater Philadelphia - Administrative Version DVRPC Publication No. 17039 12/2017Major Regional Projects are large-scale projects that will have a significant impact on regional travel. Almost all system expansion projects are Major Regional Projects, as are reconstruction projects on the region s freeways. Major Operational Improvement initiatives, such as SEPTA s fare modernization project, are also listed in the Plan. For the sake of brevity, smaller-scale projects that were identified in the needs assessment are not listed in the Plan document. Instead, the various funding categories in the Plan serve as placeholders for their funding, and they may be explicitly listed in future iterations of the TIP.
dct_alternativeTitle_sm: DVRPC Connections 2045 Major Regional Transportation Projects (points)
dc_title_s: Connections 2045 Major Regional Transportation Projects (points): Delaware Valley Regional Planning Commission
